name: Someone Like Me
description: Unless you intervene, the Federation--and then the galaxy--is doomed to war with the Tholian Assembly. Confront Suspiria and Kes, and find a way to undo this terrible future!
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Chakotay, Tanis, Kim, Caregivers, Warp Theorists or Suspiria will provide a bonus to Ship Battles.
-- Using the Krenim Weapon Ship, U.S.S Voyager, or the Val Jean will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Chakotay, Tanis, Kim, Caregivers, Warp Theorists, or Suspiria
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.flavor: Fifteen years after losing Voyager in an attempt to get home, Harry resolved to alter the past to save the ship.

adventures.name: Another Future War
adventures.description: Learn the Tholians' orders in the Temporal Cold War.

adventures.name: A Logical Response
adventures.description: Consult Vulcan authorities on the best approach.

adventures.name: Tholian Treaty
adventures.description: A long-lasting peace treaty with the Tholian Assembly.

rewards.name: Someone Like Me
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: Kim
rewards.flavor: Fifteen years after losing Voyager in an attempt to get home, Harry resolved to alter the past to save the ship.

action.name: Give Life, Kill, It Is All The Same

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Mother, please, you don't know what you're saying. You're not well--"

"The Captain already knows, Linnis. Suspiria and the Tholians will destroy the Federation. For revenge, yes--for causing this temporal crisis, for endangering the Ocampa and killing the Caretaker. But I'm helping her for you."

"I hated so many things about the future I saw--but not you. Never you. I want you to live. I want you to be real. If the Captain prevents us from coming here, prevents Suspiria from helping, I might lose you forever. I won't let that happen."

"I'd rather vanish from existence than be responsible for a war. I'll try to learn more about Suspiria's grievances. Until then, we can tackle this problem the old-fashioned way: Starfleet diplomacy. Engage the Tholian Assembly, befriend them before this war even begins."
"A Nacene is a near-omnipotent being. I'm worried that no matter how hard we appeal to the Tholians, Suspiria will find a way to make this war a reality."
"Everyone has a price. And remember, these anomalies aren't just taking things away--they're bringing them back, too."

responses.text: "Captain Janeway mentioned someone called the Caretaker?"
"The Ocampa are her own children, in a way. What about them?"
"She wants us dead. I'm not interested in making that happen."

screens.text: "Kes wants you to exist. We've been working on some technology that I think can make that happen... but what does Suspiria want?"
"We can offer the Ocampa their own settlement, and anything else they need... but so can Suspiria."
"We're fighting an enemy bigger and stronger than us. We have to think creatively."
"The Caretaker was the Nacene that brought Voyager and the Val Jean to the Delta Quadrant. He died shortly after... but maybe we can find him again in this timeline!"
"Captain! Suspiria and her Ocampa have taken control of my ship! With Krenim technology, they could start this war before any of us were even born!"

"Chakotay will sync up with Captain Janeway and find the Caretaker. Linnis, come with me, and I think we can find a way to stabilize your presence in this timeline. Captain, do whatever you can to keep that Krenim ship here!"
